Katissaha Thera：1．Katissaha Thera．-An arahant．He was one of those who were staying with the Buddha at theKūtāgārasālā inVesāli．When the Licchavis began to visit the Buddha in large numbers，they left the monastery and retired to places of solitude，such asGosingasālavana．A．v．133．

2．Katissaha．-One of the chief supporters ofDhammadassī Buddha．Bu．xvi．20．
